struct.name: line_id_pair
struct.brief: helper struct to carry a pair of line_ids around

function.name: print_levenshtein_smallest_edits_to_out_file
function.brief: send optimal levenshtein distance string_with_size to given file
function.doc: since address being taken for use in for_each, compiler will also emit non-inline version

argument.name: arg
argument.doc: the line_id_pair to compare and get levenshtein distance string from

argument.name: files_and_indices
argument.doc: metadata indicating where to get levenshtein distances

function.name: print_line_id_pair
function.brief: helper function for debugging to print pairs of a line_id
